Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: CDs, talking books, language tapes, newspapers, A3 and A4 photocopier, jigsaws, and DVDs. Activities include Baby Time, children's Story Time and evening activities for children. Holds Councillor's surgeries, adult reading group, health walks, poetry evenings and chairobics. Provides 9 People's Network computers (5 for adults, 4 for children) with Microsoft Office, internet access and printer all available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-12.30pm, 1.30-7pm, Tues, Wed & Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Thurs closed, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); Tues 2-4pm (craft group), Wed morning and afternoon (Story session for under 4s, waiting list), at 10.30am (Health Walk), 10-11.30am (coffee morning), Thurs 2-3pm (Chairobics, see separate entry)
